website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Vista’s heritage dates back to their 1970s retro runners. Almost fifty years later, the classic style only grew better with age, still hugely appealing to the style-conscious buyers of today.Stylish, but with substance, the Puma Vista is made super comfortable by its soft and breathable mesh-suede upper and well-padded collar—features praised by wearers and workers alike. All in all, this budget-friendly Puma Vista is a sure highlight in one’s shoe collection.
pros: Heaps of buyers dig the Puma Vista’s 1970s retro look
The variety of retro-inspired colorways has appealed to some shoppers
Quite a few people have declared that the Puma Vista is one of the best Puma shoes they have bought in a while
Several workers say they could stand and walk in them for hours without hurting their feet
The breathable mesh-suede upper is a big plus to a couple of users
At least one person likens the Puma Vista’s thick sole to a soft pillow
cons: The Puma Vista lacks arch support, a couple of wearers have noted
At least one user shares that his stride is slightly off when he put on this shoe
